description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.classes.vKWAJgqsI2WGpPxD]{Aura Slicer}

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened}. This effect lasts for 1 round, until you recover by retching, or until the next instance of damage you take from an attack or a damaging spell. When the effect wears off, you take additional spirit damage

rules.text: The target takes an additional @Damage[1d6[spirit]] damage (1-2 Zeal) or @Damage[2d6[spirit]] damage (3-5 Zeal). If 5 Zeal is used, the target also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} for 1 round. If the initial Sickened effect wears off due to damage from an attack or a damaging spell, combine the additional spirit damage if it is of the same damage type for the purposes of resistances and weaknesses.
rules.title: Aura Slicer
